response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product, which I believe could be equally valuable to you, is being offered to you at an exclusive price of $850,000. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and varies from person to person, but I am confident that my offer reflects its true potential and the experience it can bring to its owner. Please consider this offer carefully, and if you have any questions or would like more information, feel free to reach out. I look forward to potentially sharing this special item with you.", "product_price": 850000}
